TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {77202=Charge produce high-quality, low cost, easy to use products that combine the latest technology with simplicity, low maintenance and good ergonomics. They want to prove that bicycles and their accessories do not have to be intimidating to non-bicycle experts and that bicycles can be simple, functional and affordable. All Charge bikes are designed, tested and ridden here in the UK. It’s hard to believe that they have only been around since summer 2006. In those first few years, they established themselves as a brand known for classy designs, understated graphics, a sense of humour and impressive attention to detail. Charge bikes are brimming with character and showcase Steel, Titanium and lately Aluminium at its finest, both in term of styling and performance.}
